Please choose from the gallery some images that you want to use in this app. Go back to the app if you do not want to add more images.
Select images that you want to remove from the list. Then press the trash icon to remove, or press the cross icon to abort.

The name “%1$s” already exists - please choose another one.

Do you really want to remove %1$d images from the list “%2$s”?
